p: A solution of D11 (2.07g, 7.5mmol) in TFA (1.2ml) and DCM (20ml) was stirred at ambient temperature for 18h. Solvent was removed under reduced pressure and the residue partitoned between DCM and aqueous sodium hydrogen carbonate. Organic phase was separated, dried over MgSO 4, filtered and concentrated under reduced pressure to afford the title compound as an oil.
